alert.note: Alert for Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 8:34PM CDT until May 03 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Illinois... Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Clarksville. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 25.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Sunday was 25.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 23.0 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Mississippi River Clarksville 25.0 25.5 24.7 24.1 23.7 23.4 23.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
